statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_sales;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM fashion_sales WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM fashion_sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT brand_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM fashion_sales GROUP BY brand_id;
SELECT * FROM fashion_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sales_amount ASC;
SELECT brand_id, product_name, sales_amount, sale_date FROM fashion_sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM fashion_sales WHERE brand_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND sale_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sales_amount ASC
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM fashion_sales GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT brand_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales_count FROM fashion_sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01' GROUP BY brand_id HAVING total_sales_count > 2 ORDER BY total_sales_count DESC
SELECT brand_id, AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales FROM fashion_sales GROUP BY brand_id HAVING average_sales < 1000 ORDER BY brand_id ASC
SELECT brand_id, brand_name, product_id, product_name, sales_quantity, sales_amount FROM brand_sales;
SELECT brand_name, sales_amount, sales_quantity, product_name, brand_id, product_id FROM brand_sales;
SELECT brand_name, sales_amount, product_name, sales_quantity, brand_id, product_id FROM brand_sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity, sales_amount FROM brand_sales WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT brand_id, brand_name, product_id, product_name, sales_quantity, sales_amount FROM brand_sales WHERE sales_quantity < 50;
SELECT brand_name, sales_amount FROM brand_sales WHERE sales_quantity > 100 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT brand_name, SUM(sales_quantity) AS total_sales FROM brand_sales GROUP BY brand_name HAVING total_sales > 500 ORDER BY total_sales DESC

SELECT brand_name, product_name FROM brand_sales JOIN product_inventory ON brand_sales.product_id = product_inventory.product_id WHERE product_inventory.category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY brand_name, product_name
SELECT brand_name, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales_amount FROM brand_sales GROUP BY brand_name HAVING AVG(sales_amount) > 500
SELECT brand_name, product_name, sales_quantity FROM brand_sales UNION ALL SELECT brand_name, product_name, stock_quantity AS sales_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE sales_quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM Brands;
SELECT brand_name, brand_id FROM Brands ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Brands JOIN Products ON Brands.brand_id = Products.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name;
SELECT brand_name, product_name, price FROM Brands JOIN Products ON Brands.brand_id = Products.brand_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT brand_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Brands JOIN Products ON Brands.brand_id = Products.brand_id JOIN Sales ON Products.product_id = Sales.product_id GROUP BY brand_name HAVING total_quantity > 50;

SELECT * FROM Brands JOIN Products ON Brands.brand_id = Products.brand_id JOIN Sales ON Products.product_id = Sales.product_id WHERE Brands.brand_name = 'Apple' AND Sales.quantity > 10 ORDER BY Sales.sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM Brands JOIN Products ON Brands.brand_id = Products.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name HAVING total_products > 2 ORDER BY total_products DESC
SELECT brand_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Brands JOIN Products ON Brands.brand_id = Products.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name HAVING AVG(price) > 200 ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT sale_date, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY sale_date ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM Brand;
SELECT id, name FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, date FROM Sales WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT brand_id, COUNT(id) AS total_products FROM Product GROUP BY brand_id;
SELECT name FROM Collection WHERE start_date < '2022-05-01' AND end_date > '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM Brand WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT name, amount FROM Sales WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT p.name AS product_name, b.name AS brand_name FROM Product p JOIN Brand b ON p.brand_id = b.id;
SELECT c.name AS collection_name, COUNT(p.id) AS number_of_products FROM Collection c JOIN Product p ON c.id = p.id GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT * FROM Brand;
SELECT brand_name, brand_id FROM Brand ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT purchase_date FROM Purchase WHERE sale_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Brand;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM Customer INNER JOIN Purchase ON Customer.customer_id = Purchase.customer_id;
SELECT brand_name, product_name, price FROM Brand INNER JOIN Product ON Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
